item.title: Bad Parenting 1: Mr. Red Face
item.description:
Title: Bad Parenting 1: Mr. Red Face
Genre: Adventure , Indie
Developer: 2OO2
Publisher: 2OO2
Franchise: Bad Parenting
Release Date: Oct 9, 2024




About This Game

What's new in the Steam version?
Added Fanart Exhibition, a 3D environment decorated with your fanart. You can walk freely in this environment.
Added 4 different graphic filters and brightness setting.

Story : Mr. Red Face, a fictional character created by adults to teach their children. It's said that he often appears late at night to give gifts to well-behaved kids. But is the story of Mr. Red Face really that simple?
The game takes place in a small apartment where Ron, the game's protagonist, face terrifying supernatural phenomena and at the same time try to protect his family from the red-faced man's evil plans.

Gameplay : Bad Parenting is a linear game that delves into psychological and supernatural elements. The graphic style is based on old 90s cartoons, which will give you a nostalgic experience.

Warning : This game contains disturbing scenes that may trigger your childhood trauma.
Average duration : ~30 minutes.




Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains scenes that harm / hurt characters who are children. At the same time, the game can also stir up old memories if you have had a past of domestic violence.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel i3 3220
    • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 650 Ti
    • Storage: 500 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel i7 3770
    • Memory: 8.192 MB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 650 Ti
    • Storage: 500 MB available space

item.title: Lost Ark: T4 Founder's Platinum Pack

Title: Lost Ark: T4 Founder's Platinum Pack

About This Content

T4 Founder's Pack: Platinum
Time to Ignite your game with this Platinum level T4 Founder's Pack!

  • Crystalline Aura Plus x90-Days
  • Street Glitter Skin Chest
  • Royal Cahni Wagon Selection Chest
  • Bumblebee Pet Selection Chest

View the odds for random items included in this pack. This link can also be accessed from the in-game store. https://d3irh93dd5ckql.cloudfront.net/content/odds-en-US.html

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, Blood and Gore, Suggestive Themes, Strong Language, and Use of Alcohol.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
    • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD HD6850
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 100 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play, offers in-game purchases. System requirements for this game may change over time.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
    • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX560 2G
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 100 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play, offers in-game purchases. System requirements for this game may change over time.

item.title: Shady Knight
item.description:
Title: Shady Knight
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: Alexey 'cptnsigh'
Publisher: Alexey 'cptnsigh'
Release Date: Oct 9, 2024




About This Game

Shady Knight is a pure skill-based experience. There are no locked abilities to hold you back, the only thing that matters is how well you can master the power you’ve been given. Prove yourself worthy and break the cursed path of trials or lose yourself to the abyss of obsession.

Unique Melee Action that mixes Parkour and Combat

Your weapons react to your state, charging a strike from a slide or in the air leads to different moves. Even more interesting combinations appear once you discover that you can jump off enemies' heads or wall-kick to trigger more powerful abilities. Even a simplest thing such as a barrel can be used for both parkour and combat.

The Kick and The Chained Dagger

These two are always at your side making you deadly as hell even when unarmed, and nothing stops you from combining many of their abilities with other weapons for even crazier combos.

Fluid Platforming

Learning your movement allows you to become truly intangible in combat. Master slide jumping and learn the trickiest wall-kicking techniques to reach your goal with the flow.

Style Ranking that reflects Your Mastery

There are always multiple things you can do at each given moment: switch weapons, combine different moves, discover all contextual abilities and use the environment to reach the highest ranks. The style system isn't there to tell you how to play, it's a reflection of your skills and knowledge.

Face the Towers

Even with all of your skills, there are still knights out there waiting to take you to the limit. Four main hubs full of highly replayable towers packed with challenging combat scenarios, platforming bits and opportunities for creative environmental kills.

I will see you on the other side, Knight

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Frequent Stylized Violence, Stylized Blood



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 x64
    • Processor: 2.5 GHz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: Glyphica: Typing Survival
item.description:
Title: Glyphica: Typing Survival
Genre: Action , Indie , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: aliasBLACK
Publisher: aliasBLACK , Squeaky Wheel
Release Date: Oct 9, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Oct 9, 2024




About This Game

Typing tutor meets horde survival in this fast-paced roguelite that challenges your speed, accuracy, and strategy. Step into a minimalist arena and dominate the battlefield using your typing skills and your trusty keyboard.

Not Your Ordinary Typing Test

Type the word above an enemy to finish them off. Challenge your focus and speed as bigger waves and wicked words try to slow you down and take you out.

These wily words also have a few tricks up their sleeves. Deterministic drones will simply edge closer towards you, but egregious enemies like Swarmers will fire their little bullets at you, while Shooters charge up to unleash hell on you.

Kit Out; Don’t Keysmash

Furiously fast fingers will never be enough! Upgrade your arsenal with unlockable weapons and loot that can help you make quick work of each wave of words.

Each build is uniquely yours. Set up your Oscillator and Sentry to take care of a large swathe of territory while you pick off the stragglers, or minmax your main weapon to evolve into an alphabet assassinator? The choice is yours!

(Hot)Swap your Strategies in Formidable Boss Fights

There are multiple trials for you to overcome, and a boss guarding the end of each trial. Defeating the trials unlock challenging Omens that make your enemies even more formidable. Can you out-type and outwit our orthographic overlords?

Control Freaks Rejoice!

Hate keyboards with a passion? Or are you just better with a controller? We have you covered with controller mode that works for any controller you might have, or even on the go with your Steam Deck!

Escalating Beats to Defeat Enemies to

Get into your flow state and provide your best typing performance under pressure, accompanied by pulsating techno beats to carry you to victory.

Key Features

  • Ever-evolving Builds: Carve your own upgrade path through hundreds of combinations.

  • Augmentation System: Unlock perma-upgrades and evolve your build across sessions.

  • Typing Speedster: The higher your WPM, the more you destroy.

  • Varied Arsenal: Experiment with an expansive collection of weapons, spoils, and upgrades.

  • Quick and Accessible: Engage in 10-20 minute runs tailored for quick sessions.

  • Couch mode: Words turns into quicktime sequences on controller.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

item.title: Whimel Academy
item.description:
Title: Whimel Academy
Genre: Indie , RPG , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Impossible Home
Publisher: Impossible Home
Release Date: Oct 9, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Oct 9, 2024




About This Game

Starting today, you are admitted to Whimel Magic Academy! Whimel Academy is a famous magic school where a variety of subjects are offered to the students. You will also meet fellow students, with whom you can develop friendships and potentially romance. Your only goal is to have a fulfilling student life and fruitful education during your six years here. You'll need to put aside time to earn some extra pocket money, all while balancing your classes, hobbies, and friendships.



🌱 Whimel Academy is a cozy, slow-paced time management game where the player decide what to do from day to day, in addition the players can choose to romance one of several in-game characters. Whimel Academy aims to be a wholesome experience where the players can immerse themselves in a low-stake fantasy world and role-play as an ordinary student in a magic school.



You need to decide where and how to spend your limited time among activities such as taking classes and spending time with your friends, and also pay attention to your health and finance.
✨ Take classes.
✨ Practice magic outside class.
✨ Take part-time jobs to earn money and skill.
✨ Shop for magical supplies.





You can befriend (or romance) a variety of characters of different genders and personality. There won't be any life-or-death plot line, but you can really get to know each one of them through various conversations and interactions.

✨ Male, Female and gender-nonbinary characters.
✨ Unique personalities and deep narratives.





Whimel aims to create a wholesome fantasy world where you can feel relaxed and as if coming to home through the low-stake gameplay, cozy atmosphere and detailed slice-of-life worldbuilding.





You can specialize in different tracks of magic throughout the game. Different combinations of stats would grant you one of the 30+ endings when you graduate.





Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
